# Welcome {-}

This is the online version of *The Musician's Compendium*, a **book currently under early development**.

The Musican's Compendium is a comprehensive educational resource of all things music, covering music theory, performance, recording, and much more.

If you would like to **support my work** you can [make a small donation to me](https://www.paypal.com/donate/?token=_KFXcgpYHlQgtjDKSPBdRhIfSLoiQVKrNeyaxNvbzFDm3zqXDOkcTZ0R9F_VhTvY87_tXW&country.x=CA&locale.x=CA). Your donation will go toward improving the quality and quantity of content I can produce for you. If you cannot afford to make a donation but would still like to support my work, you can share your favourite content on this website with your peers, colleagues, friends, or family.

The book is written in [RMarkdown](https://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) with [bookdown](https://bookdown.org). It is automatically built from [source](https://github.com/mccarthy-m-g/musicians-compendium) using [github actions](https://help.github.com/en/actions). The Musician's Compendium is a collaborative effort and fixes and improvements can be contributed via pull request.
